## DATA 2010 Project

```{r}
nv_tourist <- read.csv("non-verbal tourist data.csv")
```

# TAudio1 and Proxemics might be switched
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
nv_tourist |>
  rename(
    handshake = GImg1,
    hug = GImg2,
    kiss = GImg3,
    consent = PImg1,
    interest = PImg2,
    neutral = PImg3,
    reflexive = PImg4,
    negative = PImg5,
    authoritative = TAudio1,
    sarcastic = TAudio2,
    friendly = TAudio3,
    spitting = QAudio1,
    hum = QAudio2,
    sigh = QAudio3
  )
```
